Thank you for the alignment earlier today regarding The Deal Sale Event in D3.

 

Location: Building 8 R07 as storage only, main event is in building 9 R06 showroom.

Staff Sale dates : 

*	25th August 2025 Preparation Day.
*	26th to 29th August 2025 Event Days

 

Please find attached   The Deal public Sale Check List.xlsx <https://mctfze-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/ramez_zebdie_chalhoub_com/EdyeSY_WsKVHn_-6UUiKoekBZmrQCoM1zaeC-xFGV5Sk6g?e=uv79up> 

 

Kindly note that the following pending action points were not covered during today’s meeting, Grateful if the respective owners could share a status update and ETA at your earliest convenience to ensure full clarity before our next meeting.

 

Details

Assigned To

Stock Value to be shared for Insurance 

Hagop

Define Layout of display 

Tarik / Ramez

Tables are ordered as per the layout

Tarik

Rails are is ordered as per the layout

Tarik

Shelves are ordered as per the layout

Pierre

Staff Cashiers assignment is completed

Tarik

Staff Helper assignment is completed

Pierre

Communication announcing Sale circulated 

Tarik / Marketing

Cash collection schedule is booked

Ghouse

security guard hiring is completed

Pierre

Sale Communication permit from D3

Pierre / Tarik

Venue Access Permit

Pierre / Tarik

 

Appreciate your prompt updates to support seamless execution of the event.

 

Best regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE
